channel.title: Npc and safezone help
channel.description:
Hello I know this is an easy thing to do but ive forgotten how to do it lol. How do you make Your npcs walk around what are the diffrent walk codes?
Also Im sure theres a tut for this already if there is could you link it to me. How do you make certain areas safe and certain areas like wild zones?

item.title: Npc and safezone help
item.dc:creator: @R4nge R4nge
item.description:
@R4nge wrote:

im still confused on that what do I add into those absX the cords?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc and safezone help
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

sure i look it up

look in client.java for

public boolean nonWild()

there u should see this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }[/code/ in here u can change the safe zones just add the coords of safe sones and leave the pking sones out of it

Read full topic

item.title: Npc and safezone help
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

codes are 2
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 3449 3245 3431 0 3245 3431 3245 3431 1 NPCNAME
spwan the npc the coords and the heigt then the range is from where it can walk and the walktype should be 2 for let it walk around

Read full topic
